entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] RefreshView disappears when switching tabs in a TabbedPage #17592
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Fix RemoveCurrentPageAndThenReAddDoesntCrash #17589
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Entry Next Editor #17588
  • [Android] CollectionView selection stops working when a behavior listens for LongClick events #17587
  • Maui WebAuthenticator returns back from apple signin: An error was encountered while handling the remote login #17585
  • DefaultAccessible seems to have the wrong default value #17582
  • [.net8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Grid * Row is broken on iOS #15968 #17581
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.Camera>(); When One Time Denied From Application #17580
  • [Windows] Weird state with CarouselView #17578
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Crash on CarouselView resizing the App Window #17577
    Backlog
  • [Android] Navigation performance issue #17576
    Backlog
  • [Android] BoxView CornerRadius not working #17575
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Wrong item size on the first item from vertical CollectionView #17574
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Wrong item size on horizontal CollectionView #17573
    Backlog
  • Performance issue while converting the datatemplate into view #17572
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border not clipping correctly content Image #17571
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate: PlatformView cannot be null here #17569
  • [Android] App crashes when changing tabs in Shell TabBar #17568
    Backlog
  • [Android] Effect disappearing when changing tabs on Shell TabBar #17566
    Backlog
  • When net8 app reference net7 project, breakpoint in net7 not work on Android #17564

Closed

  • RC1 File/New MAUI Blazor Hybrid gets several MA002 warnings about UseMaui and SkipValidateMauiImplicitPackageReferences #17561
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] Exception while using SetAppTheme extension #17478
  • MAUI 7.0.92 requires Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions 7.0.0 while .NET 7.0.9 7.0.1 #16244
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Combination of Frame and Grid with too big content (Text or Path) will cause Xaml.UnhandledException #15106
    Backlog
  • Style inheritance broken for ImageCell #17429
  • [XamlC] Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute. #17563
  • Use 'eg' to describe examples, not 'ex' #17492

PullRequests

Created

  • Recreate the Navigation Host If It's been Destroyed #17594
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Eilon/create template test artifacts #17586
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • [net8.0] Try a coherent updated of all rc2 versions #17583
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Bump net7 stable #17570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Add the missing package to the Blazor template #17579
    area/templates 📄
  • [C] Convert values on AppThemeBinding #17567
  • Enable performance CAs for more Core classes #17524
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1938.49 to 1.0.2045.28 #17486
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17562
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17557
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Improve comments in customer facing project templates #17518
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    Under Consideration
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    Under Consideration
  • [controls] improve "setter specificity" performance #17527
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the xunit group with 2 updates #17510
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17509
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Backport Legacy Control Gallery #17434
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/platform, Under Consideration
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
